transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ji sir.
Customer: Ji Vishal baat kar raha hu India Mart se taraf se.
Executive: Ha ji boliye sir jo aapka complaint tha sir ye wala India Mart pe jo Krishna company wale ke liye tha. Ha ji connect kiya tha. Main keh raha tha sir aap jante hi hai sir ki hamara to kam khali customer ki requirement provide karna hai sir. Ha ji. Abhi bhi keh raha hu sir ki ho sake kar lijiye sir isko aage continue taki jo hum already India Mart pe jo listing aapki bana rahe hain usko maintain kar paye aage.
Customer: Kuch progress kiya aapne kuch?
Executive: Kispe?
Customer: Ispe kam kiya kuch aapne kuch leads vagaira dekho main aapko batau sir.
Executive: Leads jo aap mujhse keh rahe hain na India Mart pe hum jo jo customer contact karta hai hum portal pe upload karte hain sir aur jahan tak jo aap keh rahe hain na lead consumption ki uske liye sir dekho mujhe nahi pata ki kaun sa buyer kis time pe us lead ko consume kar lega sir.
Customer: To fir fayda kya hai sir maine jinko service di hai maine kal bhi unko message kiya hai main kaha dekho main online tha. Hmm. Online bhi tha maine screenshot bhi send kiya us time ka.
Executive: Ji. Thik hai fir bhi mere pass lead nahi hai. Hmm hmm ji. But mere account me show ho na mere account me show ho jaye yahan par main by leads check karta hu mere me show ho jaye. Agar wo main click nahi karta to meri galti.
Executive: Ji main aapki puri baat sun raha hu main aapki puri baat sun raha hu sir. Sir par kya hai dekho India Mart pe jo bhi hum aapko lead provide karte hain humne portal pe usko float kar dena hai sir. Ab dekho mere pass aap samajh sakte hain ki aur bhi supplier hai humne teen percent ka ek concept laga rakha hai.
Customer: Sir sir wo baat kar raha hu na fir aapke pass main fir bar main repeat kar raha hu wahi baat ki aapke pass traffic jyada hai server aapka support nahi karta isliye customer ko is matlab jo hamari category hai na ye isme aap service bahut mushkil ho jayegi isko manage karna.
Executive: Nahi kyuki dekho India Mart pe jo hamara hai na sir hum aapko khali customer hi provide kar dete hain main ek hi cheez keh raha hu baki jo aap mujhe keh rahe hain lead consume hone ki sir uske liye jo lead available hai aap usko to consume karke wahan se business generate kar sakte hain.
Customer: Sir hame 10-20 lead kya lena hai 10-20 kaun lega ji hum hum baithe hain Firozpur mein bilkul border area mein ab leads aa rahi hai Mohali ki Chandigarh ki 20-20 ke liye kaun dene jayega ji wahan se ab aapne limitation mere sath kar di hai sir ki ek to main area bhi aapka cover karu jo khali Punjab ka ho sir thik hai aur usme requirement bhi wahi la ke du khali jo ki bulk requirement mein apna deal karte hain sir. Sir sochiye agar bulk requirement wahan par hai. Mere se mere se ek minute mein yahi hui hai Punjab ki aur bulk leads ki.
Executive: To fir bataiye fir kaise kare sir aage isko.
Customer: Isko fir close kar do band kar do fir usko kaun so aur kya. 
Executive: Par sir band karke sir aap ye sochiye India Mart pe promotion aapka band ho jayega sir.
Customer: Fir main dusri service le lunga na main kyuki maine promotion hi karni hai to fir main google pe chala jaunga na wahan par mera mere 10-12000 karoge. Agar sir humari website banayenge usme 10-12000 lagta hai hamara to fir kya fayda 40000 dene ka. 
Executive: Sir website banane ke baad usko run karne ka bhi aapka cost aata hai. Wo run nahi fir to sir wo to fir hame pata hai na hame jitna paisa diya utna hum uske kam kar rahe hain. Usme promotion bhi hai na usme usme facebook mein instagram mein youtube mein promotion bhi hai usme including 12000 mein. Main ek bari baat karke aapko update kar raha hu sir se final baat karke. Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough leads.

- Wants leads from Punjab only.

- Server is slow and not supporting traffic.



Resolution:

- Executive explained lead providing process.

- Executive explained about lead consumption.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update after talking to senior.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, promotion, website, subscription
